game.title: The Missing Princess
game.objective: Find and rescue the missing princess from the evil dragon's lair.
game.description: The princess of the kingdom has been kidnapped by an evil dragon and taken to its lair. The king has sent out a call for heroes to rescue her. You have been chosen for this task.
game.reward: A large sum of gold and the princess's hand in marriage.

task.description: The dragon's lair is located in the mountains to the north of the kingdom. It is a dangerous journey, but you must be brave.
task.location: Mountains to the north of the kingdom

task.description: Once you reach the dragon's lair, defeat the dragon in battle. The dragon is a powerful creature, but you must be strong and courageous.
Once you have rescued the princess, bring her back to this location for further instructions.

task.objective: Return to the king with the princess.
task.description: After delivering the princess, report to the castle entrance.
